availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel P. Hunt (Mason County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Bermuda. Married to Mary A. Mullins Hunt in Mason County in December 1852. Father of Mary E. Hunt, Natalia Hunt, Emma Hunt, Sallie Hunt, and John Hunt. Merchant in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, p. 14.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Maysville, Ward 4, p. 10.
